extendedInfo.description: DroidBAC is a simple yet sophisticated blood alcohol content calculator app with an user interface based on the new Ice Cream Sandwich design standards. Simply enter your information, how many drinks and their type (beer, shot, etc.), and how long you have been drinking to calculate your blood alcohol content.*The blood alcohol content estimate provided by DroidBAC should not be used by individuals to decide whether or not to drive after drinking. Impairment can result from any amount of alcohol.*Blood alcohol content calculations are based off the U.S. Department of Transportation.*Features- Create your own custom drinks- Graph to see BAC over time- Non dated user interface, ICS styling, ICS compatible- Free!*For use in the United States only! Units used are United States customary units and 0.08 is the legal limit.*Thanks for using my app!Coming soon - Dynamic representation of BAC over time.Keywords: blood alcohol calculator, blood alcohol content, bac calculator, blood alcohol level, alcodroid alternative

reviews.title: Awesome and Works Perfectly!
reviews.comment: Now I can know my legal limit to drive my car home from the bar!  Hoooooray!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: This app is amazing and truly works
